verbs.description: [ARG0: Political observers on Twitter] [ARGM-MNR: unanimously] [V: agree] [ARG1: that Donald Trump had a major political win today by securing the freedom of the three American prisoners who were being held in North Korea] .

Political observers on Twitter unanimously agree that Donald Trump had a major political win today by securing the freedom of the three American prisoners who [V: were] being held in North Korea .
Political observers on Twitter unanimously agree that Donald Trump had a major political win today by securing the freedom of the three American prisoners who were [V: being] held in North Korea .
